home.title: AddOnForge
home.subtitle: Community Platform for World of Warcraft AddOn Requests
home.description: Inspired by WeakAuras. Share your AddOn ideas, vote for the best suggestions and track development progress.
home.requestsFound: {count, plural, =0 {No requests} one {# request} other {# requests}} found
home.noRequestsFiltered: No requests found. Try different filters.

create.title: Create New AddOn Request
create.subtitle: Describe your idea for a World of Warcraft AddOn. The community can vote for your request and leave comments.
create.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe in detail what features the AddOn should have and what problem it solves...
create.tagsPlaceholder: e.g. ui, quest, tracking (separate with comma)
create.tagsHint: Add tags to make your request more discoverable
create.screenshotsHint: Maximum 5 screenshots, max. 5MB each (PNG, JPG, WebP)
create.loginRequiredText: You must be logged in to create an AddOn request.

errors.loginRequired: You must be logged in to create a request.
errors.titleTooShort: Title must be at least 5 characters long.
errors.descriptionTooShort: Description must be at least 20 characters long.
errors.createError: Error creating request. Please try again.

request.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first!
request.notFoundText: The requested AddOn request could not be found.
request.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this request?

footer.aboutText: A community platform for World of Warcraft AddOn requests. Inspired by WeakAuras, built for the community.
footer.madeWith: Made with <heart></heart> for the WoW Community

about.title: About AddOnForge
about.subtitle: Community-driven. Open Source. For WoW players.
about.missionText: AddOnForge was created to connect the World of Warcraft community. We believe the best ideas come from the community.
about.opensourceText: Our code is available on GitHub

time.minutesAgo: {count, plural, one {# minute} other {# minutes}} ago
time.hoursAgo: {count, plural, one {# hour} other {# hours}} ago
time.daysAgo: {count, plural, one {# day} other {# days}} ago

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.message: We use cookies to improve your experience.
